00045 function inspect_var($var, $depth=NULL)
00046 {
00047     $varType = gettype($var);
00048 
00049     echo "<div>"
00050         ."<pre style=\"font-family: Arial, sans; font-size: 14px;\">";
00051 
00052     switch ($varType) {
00053         case "integer":
00054         case "int":
00055         case "double":
00056         case "float":
00057             _inspect_var_Number($var);
00058         break;
00059         case "string":
00060             _inspect_var_String($var);
00061         break;
00062         case "object":
00063             _inspect_var_Object($var, (boolean)$depth);
00064         break;
00065         case "array":
00066             _inspect_var_Array($var, (integer)$depth);
00067         break;
00068         case "resource":
00069             _inspect_var_Resource($var);
00070         break;
00071         case "boolean":
00072             _inspect_var_Boolean($var);
00073         break;
00074         default:
00075             _inspect_var_Generic($var);
00076         break;
00077     }
00078     
00079     echo "</pre>"
00080         ."</div>";
00081 }

00090 function _inspect_var_Resource($var)
00091 {
00092     $resourceName = get_resource_type($var);
00093 
00094     echo
00095         "<span style=\"font-size: 11px; color: #56a0ee\">(resource)</span> " .
00096         "<span style=\"color: #f06f00;\">{$resourceName}</span> "            .
00097         "<span style=\"color: #3f6b5b; font-style: italic; font-size: 12px;\">({$var})</span>";
00098 }

00182 function _inspect_var_Object($obj, $inDepth=FALSE)
00183 {
00184     dependsOn('Reflection');
00185 
00186     $reflect = new ReflectionClass($obj);
00187     
00188     /*
00189      *
00190      *
00191      */
00192     $className  = get_class($obj);
00193     $parentName = get_parent_class($obj);
00194     $subClasses = NULL;
00195     $interfaces = NULL;
00196     $interfacesStr = NULL;
00197     $isUserDefined = $reflect->isUserDefined();
00198     $properties = $reflect->getProperties();
00199     $constants  = $reflect->getConstants();
00200     $statics    = $reflect->getStaticProperties();
00201 
00202     
00203     if ($parentName)
00204         $subClasses = _inspect_var_Object_getSubclasses($parentName);
00205     
00206     $interfaces = $reflect->getInterfaces();
00207     if (sizeof($interfaces)) {
00208         foreach ($interfaces as $interface)
00209             $interfacesStr .= $interface->getName() . ", ";
00210 
00211         $interfacesStr = substr($interfacesStr, 0, strlen($interfacesStr)-2);
00212     }
00213 
00214     /*
00215      *
00216      *
00217      */
00218     if ($inDepth==TRUE)
00219         ;
00220 
00221 
00222     /*
00223      * Class name.
00224      *
00225      * Όνομα κλάσης.
00226      */
00227     echo
00228         "<fieldset style=\"border: 1px solid #c5c5c5;\">"       .
00229         "<legend> <i>object</i> <b>{$className}</b> </legend>"  .
00230         "<div style=\"padding: 10px;\">";
00231 
00232     /*
00233      * Show information.
00234      *
00235      * Εμφάνιση πληροφοριών.
00236      */
00237     echo
00238         "<div style=\"color: #3f6b5b; float: left; width: 150px; overflow: hidden;\">Defined by</div>";
00239     echo
00240         "<span style=\"font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; color: #f06f00;\">" .
00241         (($isUserDefined==TRUE) ? "User" : "System") . 
00242         "</span>";
00243     echo "<hr />";
00244 
00245     echo
00246         "<div style=\"color: #3f6b5b; float: left; width: 150px; overflow: hidden;\">Is abstract</div>";
00247     echo
00248         "<span style=\"font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; color: #f06f00;\">" .
00249         (($reflect->isAbstract()==TRUE) ? "Yes" : "No") . 
00250         "</span>";
00251     echo "<hr />";
00252 
00253     echo
00254         "<div style=\"color: #3f6b5b; float: left; width: 150px; overflow: hidden;\">Is interface</div>";
00255     echo
00256         "<span style=\"font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; color: #f06f00;\">" .
00257         (($reflect->isInterface()==TRUE) ? "Yes" : "No") . 
00258         "</span>";
00259     echo "<hr />";
00260 
00261 
00262     /*
00263      * Class filename.
00264      *
00265      * Όνομα αρχείου.
00266      */
00267     echo
00268         "<div style=\"color: #3f6b5b; float: left; width: 150px; overflow: hidden;\">Filename</div>";
00269     echo
00270         "<span style=\"font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; color: #f06f00;\">" .
00271         $reflect->getFileName() . 
00272         "</span>";
00273     echo "<hr />";
00274     
00275     /*
00276      * The name of the classes this object extends.
00277      *
00278      * Οι κλάσεις από τις οποίες κληρονομεί αυτή η κλάση.
00279      */
00280     echo
00281         "<div style=\"color: #3f6b5b; float: left; width: 150px; overflow: hidden;\">Extends</div>";
00282     echo
00283         "<span style=\"font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; color: #f06f00;\">" .
00284         (($parentName!=NULL) ? $subClasses : "none") .
00285         "</span>";
00286     echo "<hr />";
00287     
00288     /*
00289      * The list of the interfaces of class implements or inherits.
00290      *
00291      * Τα interfaces που υλοποιεί (ή κληρονομή) η κλάση αυτή
00292      */
00293     echo
00294         "<div style=\"color: #3f6b5b; float: left; width: 150px; overflow: hidden;\">Implements</div>";
00295     echo
00296         "<span style=\"font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; color: #f06f00;\">" .
00297         (($interfacesStr!=NULL) ? $interfacesStr : "none") .
00298         "</span>";
00299     
00300 
00301     echo "<br /><br /><br />";
00302 
00303     /*
00304      * Properties dumping.
00305      *
00306      * Εμφάνιση ιδιοτήτων.
00307      */
00308     echo "<ul><b>Properties</b>";
00309     foreach ($properties as $prop) {
00310         $status =  ($prop->isPublic())
00311                     ? "public"
00312                     : (($prop->isPrivate()) ? "private" : "protected"
00313                     );
00314         
00315         $value = "";
00316         if ($status=="public")
00317             $value = "(value={$prop->getValue($obj)})";
00318 
00319         echo
00320             "<li>" .
00321             "<span style=\"color: #4e9a06; font-size: 12px;\">{$status}</span> " .
00322             "<span style=\"color: #56a0ee; font-style: italic;\">{$prop->getName()}</span> " .
00323             "{$value}" .
00324             "</li>";
00325     }
00326     echo "</ul>";
00327 
00328     echo
00329         "</div>"    .
00330         "</legend>";
00331 }

00340 function _inspect_var_Object_getSubclasses($obj)
00341 {
00342     $parent = get_parent_class($obj);
00343 
00344     if ($parent!=NULL)
00345         return $obj . ", " . _inspect_var_Object_getSubClasses($parent);
00346     else
00347         return $obj;
00348 }
